title: Authors and Citation
text: Shiqi Zhao. Author, maintainer, copyright holder.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zhao S (2025). BioVizSeq: Visualizing Elements Within Bio-Sequences. R package version 1.0.3, https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=BioVizSeq.
code: @Manual{,   title = {BioVizSeq: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences},   author = {Shiqi Zhao},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 1.0.3},   url = {https://CRAN.R-project.org/package=BioVizSeq}, }

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
text: goal BioVizSeq visualize types distribution elements within bio-sequences. time, developed geom layer, geom_rrect(), can generate rounded rectangles. external references used development package.

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
text: Install CRAN:  Install Github: development version BioVizSeq:
code: # Install from CRAN install.packages("BioVizSeq") install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("zhaosq2022/BioVizSeq")

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
code: library(BioVizSeq) #> Registered S3 methods overwritten by 'treeio': #>   method              from     #>   MRCA.phylo          tidytree #>   MRCA.treedata       tidytree #>   Nnode.treedata      tidytree #>   Ntip.treedata       tidytree #>   ancestor.phylo      tidytree #>   ancestor.treedata   tidytree #>   child.phylo         tidytree #>   child.treedata      tidytree #>   full_join.phylo     tidytree #>   full_join.treedata  tidytree #>   groupClade.phylo    tidytree #>   groupClade.treedata tidytree #>   groupOTU.phylo      tidytree #>   groupOTU.treedata   tidytree #>   inner_join.phylo    tidytree #>   inner_join.treedata tidytree #>   is.rooted.treedata  tidytree #>   nodeid.phylo        tidytree #>   nodeid.treedata     tidytree #>   nodelab.phylo       tidytree #>   nodelab.treedata    tidytree #>   offspring.phylo     tidytree #>   offspring.treedata  tidytree #>   parent.phylo        tidytree #>   parent.treedata     tidytree #>   root.treedata       tidytree #>   rootnode.phylo      tidytree #>   sibling.phylo       tidytree #> Package BioVizSeq loaded successfully!  # Extra package library(ggplot2) #> Warning: 程辑包'ggplot2'是用R版本4.3.3 来建造的

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
code: gff_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpro.gff3", package = "BioVizSeq") gff_data <- read.table(gff_path, header = FALSE, sep = '\t') gff_loc <- gff_to_loc(gff_data)  motif_plot(gff_loc$table_loc, gff_loc$gene_length) +     labs(x="DNA length (5'-3')", y="Gene name")

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
code: gff_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpro.gff3", package = "BioVizSeq") gff_plot(gff_path)

code: meme_path <- system.file("extdata", "mast.xml", package = "BioVizSeq")  meme_file <- readLines(meme_path) motif_loc <- meme_to_loc(meme_file)  motif_plot(motif_loc$table_loc, motif_loc$gene_length)

code: hitdata_path <- system.file("extdata", "hitdata.txt", package = "BioVizSeq") cdd_file <- readLines(hitdata_path) domain_loc <- cdd_to_loc(cdd_file)  fa_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpep.fa", package = "BioVizSeq") gene_length <- fastaleng(fa_path) motif_plot(domain_loc, gene_length)

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
code: fa_path <- system.file("extdata", "target.fa", package = "BioVizSeq") domain_loc <- smart_to_loc(fa_path) #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_002... #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_003... #> Job entered the queue with ID39171115118211801744387881ZDjUBxRVzJ. Waiting for results. #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_004... #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_005...  motif_plot(domain_loc$table_loc, domain_loc$gene_length)

code: fa_path <- system.file("extdata", "target.fa", package = "BioVizSeq")  smart_plot(fa_path) #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_002... #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_003... #> Job entered the queue with ID39171115118238181744387910nzudunHPXm. Waiting for results. #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_004... #> Submitting sequence AtAP2_005...

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
code: # 1. upload fasta file to plantcare, get the result file(.tab) # upload_fa_to_plantcare(fasta_file, email)  # 2. Classify the functions of cis element  plantcare_path <- system.file("extdata", "plantCARE_output.tab", package = "BioVizSeq")  plantcare_file <- read.table(plantcare_path, header = FALSE, sep = '\t', quote="") plantcare_data <- plantcare_classify(plantcare_file) plantcare_loc <- plantcare_to_loc(plantcare_data)  promoter_length <- data.frame(ID = unique(plantcare_loc$ID), length=2000)  motif_plot(plantcare_loc, promoter_length) +     labs(x="Promoter Length", y="Gene")

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
code: plantcare_path <- system.file("extdata", "plantCARE_output.tab", package = "BioVizSeq")  plantcare_plot(plantcare_path, promoter_length = 2000)

title: Visualizing the Elements Within Bio-Sequences
text: p_tree, p_gff, p_pfam, p_meme, p_smart, p_cdd, p_plantcare
code: library(patchwork) tree_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpep.nwk", package = "BioVizSeq") gff_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpro.gff3", package = "BioVizSeq") meme_path <- system.file("extdata", "mast.xml", package = "BioVizSeq") pfam_path <- system.file("extdata", "iprscan.tsv", package = "BioVizSeq") plot_file <- combi_p(tree_path = tree_path, gff_path = gff_path,                      meme_path = meme_path, pfam_path = pfam_path)  plot_file$p_tree + plot_file$p_gff + plot_file$p_pfam +   plot_file$p_meme +plot_layout(ncol = 4, guides = 'collect') +   plot_annotation(     tag_levels = 'A'   ) library(patchwork) tree_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpep.nwk", package = "BioVizSeq") plantcare_path <- system.file("extdata", "plantCARE_output.tab", package = "BioVizSeq")  plot_file <- combi_p(tree_path = tree_path, plantcare_path = plantcare_path, promoter_length = 2000)  plot_file$p_tree + plot_file$p_plantcare1 + plot_file$p_plantcare2 + plot_layout(ncol = 3, guides = 'collect', widths = c(1, 3, 1)) + plot_annotation( tag_levels = 'A' )

title: cdd_plot — cdd_plot
code: cdd_plot(   cdd_file,   fasta_file,   the_order = NULL,   domain_select = NULL,   shape = "RoundRect",   r = 0.3,   legend_size = 15,   domain_color = NULL )

title: cdd_plot — cdd_plot
text: cdd_file path cdd file. fasta_file path fasta file. the_order path order file. List Gene ID , One ID Per Line. domain_select domain ID want align . shape RoundRect Rect. r radius rounded corners. legend_size size legend. domain_color color set domain.

title: cdd_plot — cdd_plot
code: hitdata_path <- system.file("extdata", "hitdata.txt", package = "BioVizSeq") fa_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpep.fa", package = "BioVizSeq") cdd_plot(hitdata_path, fa_path)   order_path <- system.file("extdata", "order.csv", package = "BioVizSeq") cdd_plot(hitdata_path, fa_path, the_order = order_path)

title: combi_p — combi_p
text: Get ggplot2 files facilitate free combination patchwork

title: combi_p — combi_p
code: combi_p(   tree_path,   gff_path = NULL,   meme_path = NULL,   pfam_path = NULL,   cdd_path = NULL,   fa_path = NULL,   smart_path = FALSE,   plantcare_path = NULL,   promoter_length = NULL,   renamefile = NULL,   groupfile = NULL,   shape = "RoundRect",   r = 0.3,   legend_size = 6 )

title: combi_p — combi_p
text: tree_path path tree file (.newick). gff_path path .gff/gtf file. meme_path path .meme/mast file. pfam_path path pfam result file (.tsv). cdd_path path cdd result file (.txt). fa_path path protein file (.fa/fasta). smart_path SMART . (TRUE FALSE) plantcare_path path plantcare file (.tab). promoter_length length promoter. renamefile Rename file. Two cols: new_name old_name. groupfile Group information. Two cols: label Group. shape RoundRect Rect. r radius rounded corners. legend_size size legend.

title: combi_p — combi_p
code: tree_path <- system.file("extdata", "idpep.nwk", package = "BioVizSeq") plot_file <- combi_p(tree_path)

title: fastaleng — fastaleng
code: fastaleng(fasta_file)

title: geom_rrect — geom_rrect
code: geom_rrect(   mapping = NULL,   data = NULL,   stat = "identity",   position = "identity",   r = 0.2,   ...,   na.rm = FALSE,   show.legend = NA,   inherit.aes = TRUE )

title: geom_rrect — geom_rrect
text: mapping Set aesthetic mappings created aes. specified inherit.aes = TRUE (default), combined default mapping top level plot. must supply mapping plot mapping. data data.frame, object, override plot data. objects fortified produce data frame. stat Name stat modify data. position position adjustment use overlapping points layer. r radius rounded corners. ... additional parameter, e.g. color, linewidth, alpha. na.rm "FALSE" (default), missing values removed warning. "TRUE", missing values silently removed, logical. show.legend Whether show legend, logical. inherit.aes Whether inherit aesthetic mappings, logical, defaults "TRUE".

title: geom_rrect — geom_rrect
text: draws rounded rectangle using locations four corners (xmin, xmax, ymin ymax) like geom_rect().

title: geom_rrect — geom_rrect
text: geom_rrect() understands following aesthetics (required aesthetics bold): xmin xmax ymin ymax alpha colour fill group linetype Learn setting aesthetics vignette("ggplot2-specs").

title: geom_rrect — geom_rrect
code: library(ggplot2) #> Warning: package 'ggplot2' was built under R version 4.3.3 df <- data.frame(  xmin = c(1, 2, 3),  xmax = c(2, 3, 4),  ymin = c(1, 2, 3),  ymax = c(2, 3, 4),  category = c("A", "B", "C")  )    p <- ggplot(df) +    geom_rrect(aes(xmin = xmin, xmax = xmax,                ymin = ymin, ymax = ymax, fill = category),               r = 0.4, linewidth = 1, colour = "black")     print(p)

code: gff_path <- system.file("extdata", "test.gff", package = "BioVizSeq") gff_data <- read.table(gff_path, header = FALSE, sep = '\t') gff_loc <- gff_to_loc(gff_data)  ID_path <- system.file("extdata", "ID_select.csv", package = "BioVizSeq") mRNA_ID <- readLines(ID_path)  gff_loc <- gff_to_loc(gff_data, mRNA_ID=mRNA_ID)

title: motif_plot — motif_plot

title: motif_plot — motif_plot
text: motif_loc data.frame contains columuns: ID, motif, start, end. gene_length data.fram length biosequences. Two columns: ID, length. the_order List Gene ID , One ID Per Line. motif_select motif ID want align . shape RoundRect Rect. show_motif_id Display name motif. r radius rounded corners. legend_size size legend. motif_color color set motif.

title: motif_plot — motif_plot
text: motif_plot() draws multiple rounded rectangle represent elements biosequences, limited biosequences

title: motif_plot — motif_plot
code: df <- data.frame(  ID = rep(c("geneA", "geneB", "geneC"), each = 3),  motif = rep(c("1", "2", "3"), times = 3),  start = c(1, 3, 6, 1, 6, 10, 10, 7, 17),  end = c(3, 5, 11, 3, 8, 15, 12, 9, 22)  )    length_data <- data.frame(  ID = c("geneA", "geneB", "geneC"),  length = c(15, 27, 30)  )    order_data <- c("geneB", "geneA", "geneC")    motif_plot(df, length_data)   motif_plot(df, length_data, the_order = order_data)

title: upload_fa_to_plantcare — upload_fa_to_plantcare
text: fasta_file path promoter file. email e-mail address.

title: upload_fa_to_plantcare — upload_fa_to_plantcare
text: Due file size limitation plantcare fasta, upload_fa_to_plantcare() first splits fasta file. uploads splited fasta files plantcare database, automatically returns results email provided user. upload_fa_to_plantcare("path/test.fasta", "e-mail address")

title: Version 1.0.3 (2025-04-11)
text: Changed errors plot plantcare result Added several plotting functions plantcare Improve combi_p function

title: Version 1.0.1 (2025-01-11)
text: CRAN release: 2025-01-11 get_motif_location meme_to_loc. motif_seq meme_seq. ID renamed combi_p.

title: Version 1.0.0 (2024-12-22)
text: CRAN release: 2024-12-22 Major change: Added shinyapp. Improve combi_p function add plantcare plotting.

title: Version 0.1.2 (2024-12-10)
text: CRAN release: 2024-12-10 Added function combi_p facilitate free combination patchwork.

title: Version 0.1.1 (2024-11-27)
text: CRAN release: 2024-11-27 Fixed issues gff_to_loc gff_plot functions. Corrected runtime messages smart_to_loc. Updated axis titles output plot gff_plot. Updated example files exdata directory.

title: Version 0.1.0 (2024-11-15)
text: CRAN release: 2024-11-20 Initial release BioVizSeq package.
